languages.text: "Благодарю за изящный прием, губернатор. Но мы по очень серьезному делу".
"I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за изящный прием, губернатор. Но мы по очень серьезному делу".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor. However, we have come here to address a grave concern."
"Thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor. However, we have come here to address a grave concern."
"I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."
"I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."
"I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."
"I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

languages.text: “感谢你的盛情欢迎，总督。不过，我们来这里，是为了解决某个非常严肃的问题。”
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

traits.locale_text: “感谢你的盛情欢迎，总督。不过，我们来这里，是为了解决某个非常严肃的问题。”

languages.text: 「総督、丁重なお出迎えに感謝する。だが{mf|俺|私}たちがここに来たのは、重大な懸念に対処するためだ」
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

traits.locale_text: 「総督、丁重なお出迎えに感謝する。だが{mf|俺|私}たちがここに来たのは、重大な懸念に対処するためだ」

languages.text: «Agradezco su galante bienvenida, gobernador; no obstante, hemos venido para esclarecer un asunto de extrema gravedad».
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco su galante bienvenida, gobernador; no obstante, hemos venido para esclarecer un asunto de extrema gravedad».

languages.text: "Nazik karşılama için teşekkür ederim sayın Vali ancak buraya ciddi bir meseleyi ele almaya geldik."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

traits.locale_text: "Nazik karşılama için teşekkür ederim sayın Vali ancak buraya ciddi bir meseleyi ele almaya geldik."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie pour votre accueil si courtois, gouverneur, mais nous sommes ici pour traiter une affaire des plus sérieuses. »
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie pour votre accueil si courtois, gouverneur, mais nous sommes ici pour traiter une affaire des plus sérieuses. »

languages.text: "Ich danke Euch für den freundlichen Empfang, Gouverneur. Allerdings sind wir hier, um eine ernste Angelegenheit zu besprechen."
languages.original_text: "I thank you for the courteous welcome, Governor; however, we have come here to address a grave concern."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke Euch für den freundlichen Empfang, Gouverneur. Allerdings sind wir hier, um eine ernste Angelegenheit zu besprechen."
